mapper.select: SELECT A.MEDIA_MEBERSHIP_YN, A.MEDIA_VIDEO_URL, A.MEDIA_POST_NO, A.MEDIA_POST_TITLE, A.MEDIA_POST_CN, A.MEDIA_REG_DT, A.FILE_GROUP_NO, A.MEDIA_DEL_YN, A.ISBANNER_YN, A.ART_GROUP_NO, B.ART_GROUP_NM FROM MEDIA_POST A LEFT JOIN ARTIST_GROUP B ON A.ART_GROUP_NO = B.ART_GROUP_NO ORDER BY A.MEDIA_REG_DT DESC

SELECT A.MEDIA_MEBERSHIP_YN, A.MEDIA_VIDEO_URL, A.MEDIA_POST_NO, A.MEDIA_POST_TITLE, A.MEDIA_POST_CN, A.MEDIA_REG_DT, A.FILE_GROUP_NO, A.MEDIA_DEL_YN, A.ISBANNER_YN, A.ART_GROUP_NO, B.ART_GROUP_NM , (SELECT f.file_save_locate FROM file_detail f WHERE f.file_group_no = b.logo_file_group_no ) AS file_logo_save_locate FROM MEDIA_POST A LEFT JOIN ARTIST_GROUP B ON A.ART_GROUP_NO = B.ART_GROUP_NO WHERE A.MEDIA_POST_NO = #{mediaPostNo} AND A.ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEDIA_POST SET MEDIA_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND MEDIA_POST_NO = #{mediaPostNo}
mapper.select: SELECT art_group_no , art_group_nm FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE 1=1 AND art_group_del_yn = 'N'
